faq.description: Find answers to common questions about PinkieTech's services.

items.question: How long does it take to implement an AI solution?
items.answer: Implementation time varies depending on the scope and complexity of your project. We'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.

items.question: Can you integrate with existing systems?
items.answer: Yes, we can integrate with existing systems through RESTful APIs, GraphQL, and other standard protocols.

items.question: What is your pricing structure?
items.answer: Our pricing consists of initial setup costs and monthly fees. Specific pricing varies based on usage scale and feature requirements. We'll provide a detailed quote for your needs.

items.question: Is there a minimum contract period?
items.answer: The standard minimum contract period is one year. However, we can be flexible depending on your project requirements.
